misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a notable figure from Kurk Golf, has been a consistent presence at the Hector Trophée since its inception. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Marcus has participated in each edition of the tournament, demonstrating a steadfast commitment to the sport and the event.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Marcus remains a formidable competitor. His deep understanding of the game and strategic prowess make him a player to watch in every match. He is known among his peers as a calculating and focused player, rarely giving away an inch on the course.

Off the course, Marcus is known for his introspective nature and complex personality. Some may be surprised to learn that Marcus sometimes participates in golf events under the guise of his alter ego, "Eva".
As he prepares for his 12th appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Marcus undoubtedly aims to leverage his experience and refine his tactics, hoping to finally capture the elusive title.
